Class BWHSegment

java.lang.Object
  BWHSegment

public class BWHSegment
extends java.lang.Object

Class for the use of the BitWeavingH Method, more specifically for the segments.
An instance of this class represents a segmement of data according to the BitWeaving method.
It deals with the processor words: they are construced, returned, updated, etc...

Author:
William Gorge

Constructor Detail

BWHSegment

public BWHSegment()
Default constructor

BWHSegment

public BWHSegment(long[] columnsegment,
                  int sizeofonedata,
                  int sizeofprocessorword,
                  boolean isFullSegment)
Constructs the segment given its elements in columnsegment and other parameters and indicating if it is the last segment. This information is used to optimize the construction time

Parameters:
columnsegement - elements of the segment to create
sizeofonedata - size (in bits) of one data in the column
sizeofprocessorword - size of the processor word
isFullSegment - indicates if it is a full segment or not

Gets the processor words for this segment

processor words
